data.title: Torment [Hets] (Original photograph of Mai Zetterling from the 1944 film) by Ingmar Bergman (screenwriter); Alf Sjoberg (director); Stig Jarrel, Alf Kjellin, Mai Zetterling (starring): (1944)
data.meta_description: N.p., N.p. - 1944 - Vintage reference photograph from the 1944 film, showing actress Mai Zetterling. Despite the sadistic mistreatment of his Latin teacher, a teenage boy finds solace in his love for a troubled young woman who works at a tobacco store. A breakthrough role for Zetterling. Set and shot on location in Stockholm, Sweden. 8 x 10 inches. Near Fine. - Torment [Hets] (Original photograph of Mai Zetterling from the 1944 film)
